name: Fun School!
description:
Fun School! is an educational game that started the Fun School series. This version is aimed at children under five years. Parents can choose a difficulty level for each game and also enter their own words to use. There are ten activities for a child to play and these consist of:
  • Alphabet
  • Colours
  • Counting
  • House
  • Magic Garden
  • Match Maker
  • Numbers
  • Pelican
  • Seaside
  • Snap
